00153     protected function _loadConfiguration( $optionList = array(), $overwriteExisting = true )
00154     {
00155         //  Make a copy for posterity
00156         if ( property_exists( $this, '_optionList' ) )
00157         {
00158             if ( $overwriteExisting || empty( $this->_optionList ) )
00159                 $this->_optionList = $optionList;
00160             else
00161                 $this->_optionList = array_merge( $this->_optionList, $optionList );
00162         }
00163 
00164         try
00165         {
00166             foreach ( $optionList as $_option => $_value )
00167             {
00168                 try
00169                 {
00170                     //  See if __set has a better time with this...
00171                     $this->{$_option} = $_value;
00172                 }
00173                 catch ( Exception $_ex )
00174                 {
00175                     //  Completely ignore errors...
00176                 }
00177             }
00178         }
00179         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00180         {
00181             CPSLog::error( __METHOD__, 'Error while loading configuration options: ' . $_ex->getMessage() );
00182         }
00183     }
